author: Obi-Wan3
description: Allow users to verify their email address via a command and/or reaction, with customizable options.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores provided server settings (e.g. Gmail API authentication info, allow/blocklists, timeouts, etc.).
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use `[p]help EmailVerification` for more info. **Be sure to run `[p]gmailapisetup` to set up the Gmail API with the bot.**
